items.title: Getting started
items.summary:
Installation

$ yarn add rescript-pages bs-css-emotion reason-react rescript-asyncdata

Add them to your bsconfig.json dependencies:

 "bs-dependencies": [
+  "rescript-pages",
+  "bs-css-emotion",
+  "reason-react",
+  "r

items.title: Consuming content
items.summary:
You have two hooks available to fetch content:

Items

Pages.useItem("collection", ~id="itemId")

Items have the following type:

type item = {
  slug: string,
  filename: string,
  title: string,
  date: option<string>,
